seg.source: 28岁厨师被发现死于旧金山一家商场
seg.translation: ﻿28-year-old chef found dead in San Francisco mall
﻿28-year-old chef found dead in a shopping mall in San Francisco
﻿The 28-year-old chef was found dead at a San Francisco mall

seg.source: 近日刚搬至旧金山的一位28岁厨师本周被发现死于当地一家商场的楼梯间。
seg.translation: A 28-year-old chef who recently moved to San Francisco was found dead in the stairwell of a local mall this week.
A 28-year-old chef who recently moved to San Francisco was found dead in the stairwell of a local mall this week.
A 28-year-old chef who recently moved to San Francisco was found dead in the stairwell of a local shopping mall this week.

seg.source: 但受害人的哥哥表示想不出有谁会想要加害于他，并称“一切终于好起来了。”
seg.translation: The older brother of the victim expressed that he could not think of anyone who would want to harm him, and said that “everything was finally getting better”.
But the victim's brother said that he could not think of anyone who would want to harm him, and said, "It's finally all right." ”
But the victim's brother said he could not think of anyone who would want to harm him, saying "everything is finally getting better."

seg.source: 旧金山验尸官办公室表示，周三早上于西田购物中心发现的尸体确认为28岁旧金山居民 Frank Galicia。
seg.translation: The Forensic Services of San Francisco expressed that they have verified the identity of the body found in Wednesday morning at Westfield shopping center as Frank Galicia, a 28-year old resident of San Francisco.
The San Francisco Coroner's office said the body found at the Tian Mall in Wednesday was confirmed as the 28-year-old San Francisco resident Frank in.
The San Francisco coroner's office said the body found at the Westfield Shopping Center on Wednesday morning was identified as Frank Galicia, a 28-year-old San Francisco resident.

seg.source: 旧金山警察局称该起死亡案件被裁定为他杀，并正在进行调查。
seg.translation: San Francisco police claimed that the death was ruled a homicide, and has commenced investigation.
The San Francisco Police Department said the death case was found to be homicide and is under investigation.
The San Francisco Police Department says the death was ruled a homicide and is under investigation.

seg.source: 受害人的哥哥 Louis Galicia 对美国广播公司位于旧金山的电台 KGO 表示，之前在波士顿做流水线厨师的Frank 于六个月前在旧金山的 Sons & Daughters 餐馆找到一份流水线厨师的理想工作。
seg.translation: The victim’s brother, Louis Galicia, told San Francisco KGO-TV, owned by American Broadcasting Company, that Frank, who worked as a line chef in Boston, found his ideal job as a line chef at Sons & Daughters restaurant in San Francisco six months ago.

The victim's brother, Louis in, told ABC's Radio KGO in San Francisco that Frank, who worked as a line chef in Boston, found an ideal job as a line chef at Sons & Daughters restaurant in San Francisco six months ago.

The victim's brother, Louis Galicia, told ABC radio station KGO in San Francisco that Frank, who previously worked as a streaming chef in Boston, found an ideal job as a streaming chef at San Francisco's Sons & Daughters restaurant six months ago.

seg.source: Sons & Daughters 餐馆的一位发言人表示，他们对于 Frank 的死感到“非常震惊”。
seg.translation: Another spokesperson of Sons & Daughters restaurant that they felt “extremely shocked” about Frank’s death.
A spokesman for the Sons & Daughters restaurant said they were "very shocked" at Frank's death.
A spokeswoman for the Sons & Daughters restaurant said they were "devastated" by Frank's death.

seg.source: 该发言人称，“我们是相处得像亲密无间的一家人的一个小团队，我们将深深怀念他。”
seg.translation: The spokesperson said: “Our team is like a family. We shall miss him.”
"We are a small team with a close family and we will miss him deeply," the spokeswoman said. ”
"We are a small group of people who get along like a close family, and we will miss him very much," the spokesman said.

seg.source: 在这个悲痛的时刻，我们向 Frank 的家人及朋友表达我们深切的同情与哀悼。
seg.translation: In this painful times, let us express our deepest condolences and sorrow for Frank’s family and friends.
At this sad moment, we express our deepest sympathy and condolences to Frank's family and friends.
We extend our deepest sympathy and condolences to Frank's family and friends at this sad time.

seg.source: Louis Galicia 称 Frank 起初住在招待所里，但是最近“一切终于好起来了。”
seg.translation: Louis Galicia said that Frank initially lived at the guest house, but recently “everything finally got better”.
Louis in said that Frank had initially lived in a guest house, but recently "everything has finally come to a good end." ”
Louis Galicia said Frank initially stayed in a guest house, but recently "things are finally getting better."

seg.source: Louis Galicia 告诉 KGO：“Frank找到一间公寓，同时在跟一个女孩交往。”
seg.translation: Louis Galicia told KGO, “Frank found an apartment, and was also seeing someone.”
Louis in told KGO: "Frank found an apartment and was in a relationship with a girl." ”
"Frank found an apartment and was dating a girl at the same time," Louis Galicia told KGO.

seg.source: Louis Galicia 表示，他想不出有谁会想要加害他的弟弟。
seg.translation: Louis Galicia expressed that he could not think of anyone who would harm his younger brother.
Louis in said he could not think of anyone who would want to harm his brother.
Louis Galicia said he couldn't think of anyone who would want to hurt his brother.

seg.source: Frank 拥有善良的心地及宽阔的胸怀。
seg.translation: Frank has a kind and open heart.
Frank has a good heart and broad mind.
Frank has a good heart and a big heart.

seg.source: Louis Galicia 称：“Frank 经常为家人烹饪晚餐。”
seg.translation: Louis Galicia said, “Frank often cooks dinner for the family.”
"Frank often cooks dinner for his family," says Louis in. ”
"Frank often cooks dinner for his family," said Louis Galicia.

seg.source: 他从不愿意与家人争吵。
seg.translation: He is unwilling to argue with family members.
He never wants to quarrel with his family.
He was never willing to quarrel with his family.

seg.source: 他是一个随从大家意见的人。
seg.translation: He is a person who follows the opinions of others.
He is a man of opinion.
He is a man of everyone's opinion.

seg.source: Louis Galicia 说：“世上的所有事物都有可能出错，但Frank 称得上是一个每天都发光的外粗内秀之人。”
seg.translation: Louis Galicia said, "With everything else that's going wrong with the world, Frank was that diamond in the rough that was shining bright every day."
Louis in said: "Everything in the world can be wrong, but Frank is a diamond who shines every day." ”
"Everything in the world can go wrong," says Louis Galicia, "but Frank is something of an outsider who shines every day."

seg.source: 有线索人士请拨打旧金山警察局举报电话415-575-4444。
seg.translation: Please call the San Francisco police at 415-575-4444 if you have any information.
For clues, please call the San Francisco police station to report 415-575-4444.
Anyone with information should call the San Francisco Police Department at 415-575-4444.
